item.title: AP Chemistry 2023 FRQ 1 Solution
item.description: AP Chemistry 2023 FRQ is available: https://apcentral.collegeboard.org/media/pdf/ap23-frq-chemistry.pdf AP Chemistry 2023 FRQ Q1 Solution: (a)(i) The complete electron configuration for an Mn atom in the ground state is 1s2 2s2 2p6 3s2 3p6 3d5 4s2 or [Ar] 3d5 4s2. (a)(ii) When manganese forms cations, electrons are lost from the 4s subshell. (b) Mn = 61.262 g - 60.169 g = 1.093 g (c) Cl = 62.673 g - 61.262 g = 1.
